tokenDetailsDescription: Configure your token name, ticker, and supply.
maxTokenSupplyPlaceholder: Token supply will be set when token is selected
salePricingDescription: Configure your token price, fundraising cap, sale dates, and purchase limits.
minimumPurchaseSubLabel: Leave blank for no purchase limits
buyerRequirementsHelper: Curate your available buyers by setting up a whitelist, KYC/KYB, ERC-20, or ERC-721 eligibility requirements for your sale.
nftRequirementDescription: Set an ERC-721 or ERC-1155 threshold
minimumBalanceGreaterThanZeroError: Minimum balance must be greater than 0
nftAddressInvalidError: Please enter a valid NFT contract address (ERC721 or ERC1155)
minimumAmountGreaterThanZeroError: Minimum amount must be greater than 0
whitelistDropzoneText: Click to upload or drag a .CSV file here
whitelistMinOneAddressError: At least one address is required
whitelistAddressExistsError: Address already exists in the list
noSalesYetDescription: Get started by creating your first token sale. Our guided setup will help you configure everything properly.
fundraisingGoalNotMetTitle: You did not meet your minimum fundraising goal.
fundraisingGoalNotMetDescription: You only raised {{amount}}. Reclaim your sale tokens to return funds.
successfulSaleDescription: You raised {{amount}}. Your funds are ready to be claimed.
buyerRequirementsDescription: Buyer must meet {{count}} out of {{total}} requirements:
foundersClubRequirement: Must hold at least 1 Founder's Club NFT
saleNameMinLengthError: Sale name must be at least 3 characters
saleNameMaxLengthError: Sale name must be less than 100 characters
startDateFutureError: Sale start date must be in the future
endDateAfterStartError: Sale end date must be after start date
valuationPositiveError: Valuation must be a positive number
minimumFundraisePositiveError: Minimum fundraise must be a positive number
minimumFundraiseMinimumError: Minimum fundraise must be at least $1
fundraisingCapPositiveError: Fundraising cap must be a positive number
fundraisingCapMinimumError: Fundraising cap must be at least $1
fundraisingCapGreaterThanMinimumError: Fundraising cap must be greater than minimum fundraise
minPurchasePositiveError: Minimum purchase must be a positive number
maxPurchasePositiveError: Maximum purchase must be a positive number
maxPurchaseGreaterThanMinError: Maximum purchase must be greater than minimum purchase
